contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1862 D Aston Contest
Aston Contest 0 Other
aston-contest
None
Aston Park, Birmingham See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4286.htm (includes a full list of the several own-choice pieces played by each band)
Second day of a two-day festival. A two-stage contest - 3 qualifying pools, 2 bands qualifying from each.
Charles Godfrey snr was the chairman of the judges.
Prizes: 1st: £12 for band, and silver quart cup, for bandmaster, value 14 guineas 2nd: £8 for band 3rd: £5 for band 4th: £2, for band
July 20, 2011, 3:14 p.m. July 20, 2011, 3:35 p.m.
1 Heckmondwike Albion John Brook
2 Northampton Amateur George Ashton
3 Dodsworth's J. W. Dodsworth
4 Silsden Town Band Mr Ogden
